title: Shutting Down The Internet in 30 Minutes: Chris Wysopal [ML B-Side]
description: Chris Wysopal, a cyber security pionneer and one of L0pht's founding members, talks about the group's 1998 testimony in the Senate, how they used shaming to force cooporations to fix their software, and the (not so fortunate) consequenses of the sale to @stake.
content:encoded: Chris Wysopal (aka WeldPond), a cyber security pioneer and one of L0pht’s founding members, talks about the group’s 1998 testimony in the Senate, how they used shaming to force corporations to fix their software, and the (not so fortunate) consequences of the sale to @stake.

itunes:author: Cybereason
